Built In Field Access Policies

Singleton classes implementing the various accessibility policy of the fields.

Contents
Built In Field Access PoliciesSingleton classes implementing the various accessibility policy of the fields.
srm_rw_policyRead Write Field
srm_ro_policyRead Only Field
srm_rc_policyRead clear Field.
srm_rs_policyRead Set Field
srm_wrc_policyWrite Read Clear Field.
srm_wrs_policyWrite Read Seta Field.
srm_wc_policyWrite Clear Field.
srm_ws_policyWrite Set Field.
srm_wsrc_policyWrite Set Read Clear Field.
srm_wcrs_policyWrite Clear Read Set.
srm_w1c_policyWrite 1 Clear Field.
srm_w1s_policyWrite 1-clears the bit, 0-no effect, Read: no affect
srm_w1t_policyWrite 1 Set Field.
srm_w0c_policyWrite 0 Clear Field.
srm_w0s_policyWrite 0 Set Field.
srm_w0t_policyWrite 1- no effect, 0- toggle, Read: no affect
srm_w1src_policyWrite 1- set effect, 0-no effect , Read: clears
srm_w1crs_policyWrite 1- clear, 0-no effect , Read: sets
srm_w0src_policyWrite 1- no effect, 0-sets , Read: clears
srm_w0crs_policyWrite 1- no effect, 0- clears, Read: sets
srm_wo_policyWrite as is, Read: error
srm_woc_policyWrite clears all bits, Read: error
srm_wos_policyWrite sets all bits, Read: error

srm_rw_policy

Read Write Field

Summary
srm_rw_policy
Read Write Field
Class Hierarchy
srm_base_field_policy
srm_rw_policy
Class Declaration
class srm_rw_policy extends srm_base_field_policy
Methods
get_nameReturns the name of the policy.
read_policyUpdate regstore with the read data from design.
write_policyUpdate regstore with the data writtedn to design.

Methods

get_name

virtual function string get_name()

Returns the name of the policy.

virtual function bit read_policy( srm_base_field  field,
ref  srm_data_t  bytes )

Update regstore with the read data from design.

virtual function bit write_policy( srm_base_field  field,
ref  srm_data_t  bytes )

Update regstore with the data writtedn to design.

srm_rc_policy

Read clear Field.

Read clears all the bits in Field.  Write has no effect.

Summary
srm_rc_policy
Read clear Field.
Class Hierarchy
srm_base_field_policy
srm_rc_policy
Class Declaration
class srm_rc_policy extends srm_base_field_policy

srm_rs_policy

Read Set Field

Read sets all the bits.  Write has no effect.

virtual class srm_base_field_policy
Base class for access policy on a field per address map.
virtual function string get_name()
Returns the name of the policy.
virtual function bit read_policy( srm_base_field  field,
ref  srm_data_t  bytes )
Update regstore with the read data from design.
virtual function bit write_policy( srm_base_field  field,
ref  srm_data_t  bytes )
Update regstore with the data writtedn to design.
